description: For a given DMS Serverless replication configuration, DMS stops any and all ongoing DMS Serverless replications. This command doesn't deprovision the stopped replications.

parameters.name: ReplicationConfigArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the replication to stop.

nested_items.name: Replication
nested_items.description: The replication that DMS stopped.

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfigIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier for the ReplicationConfig associated with the replication.

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name for the ReplicationConfig associated with the replication.

nested_items.name: SourceEndpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name for an existing Endpoint the serverless replication uses for its data source.

nested_items.name: TargetEndpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name for an existing Endpoint the serverless replication uses for its data target.

nested_items.name: ReplicationType
nested_items.description: The type of the serverless replication.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the serverless replication.

nested_items.name: ProvisionData
nested_items.description: Information about provisioning resources for an DMS serverless replication.

nested_items.name: ProvisionState
nested_items.description: The current provisioning state.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedCapacityUnits
nested_items.description: The number of capacity units the replication is using.

nested_items.name: DateProvisioned
nested_items.description: The timestamp when DMS provisioned replication resources.

nested_items.name: IsNewProvisioningAvailable
nested_items.description: Whether the new provisioning is available to the replication.

nested_items.name: DateNewProvisioningDataAvailable
nested_items.description: The timestamp when provisioning became available.

nested_items.name: ReasonForNewProvisioningData
nested_items.description: A message describing the reason that DMS provisioned new resources for the serverless replication.

nested_items.name: PremigrationAssessmentStatuses
nested_items.description: The status output of premigration assessment in describe-replications.

nested_items.name: PremigrationAssessmentRunArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: FailOnAssessmentFailure
nested_items.description: A configurable setting you can set to true (the defualt setting) or false. Use this setting to to stop the replication from starting automatically if the assessment fails. This can help you evaluate the issue that is preventing the replication from running successfully.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: This describes the assessment run status. The status can be one of the following values:
cancelling: The assessment run was canceled.
deleting: The assessment run was deleted.
failed: At least one individual assessment completed with a failed status.
error-provisioning: An internal error occurred while resources were provisioned (during the provisioning status).
error-executing An internal error occurred while individual assessments ran (during the running status).
invalid state: The assessment run is in an unknown state.
passed: All individual assessments have completed and none have a failed status.
provisioning: The resources required to run individual assessments are being provisioned.
running: Individual assessments are being run.
starting: The assessment run is starting, but resources are not yet being provisioned for individual assessments.
warning: At least one individual assessment completed with a warning status.

nested_items.name: PremigrationAssessmentRunCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date which the assessment run was created.

nested_items.name: AssessmentProgress
nested_items.description: The progress values reported by the AssessmentProgress response element.

nested_items.name: IndividualAssessmentCount
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that are specified to run.

nested_items.name: IndividualAssessmentCompletedCount
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that have completed, successfully or not.

nested_items.name: LastFailureMessage
nested_items.description: The last message generated by an individual assessment failure.

nested_items.name: ResultLocationBucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that Database Migration Service Serverless created to store the results of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: ResultLocationFolder
nested_items.description: The folder within an Amazon S3 bucket where you want Database Migration Service to store the results of this assessment run.

nested_items.name: ResultEncryptionMode
nested_items.description: The supported values are SSE_KMS and SSE_S3. If these values are not provided, then the files are not encrypted at rest. For more information, see Creating Amazon Web Services KMS keys to encrypt Amazon S3 target objects.

nested_items.name: ResultKmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a custom KMS encryption key that you specify when you set ResultEncryptionMode to SSE_KMS.

nested_items.name: ResultStatistic
nested_items.description: The object containing the result statistics for a completed assessment run.

nested_items.name: Passed
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that successfully passed all checks in the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Failed
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that failed to meet the criteria defined in the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that encountered a critical error and could not complete properly.

nested_items.name: Warning
nested_items.description: Indicates that the recent completed AssessmentRun triggered a warning.

nested_items.name: Cancelled
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that were cancelled during the assessment run.

nested_items.name: Skipped
nested_items.description: The number of individual assessments that were skipped during the assessment run.

nested_items.name: StopReason
nested_items.description: The reason the replication task was stopped. This response parameter can return one of the following values:
"Stop Reason NORMAL"
"Stop Reason RECOVERABLE_ERROR"
"Stop Reason FATAL_ERROR"
"Stop Reason FULL_LOAD_ONLY_FINISHED"
"Stop Reason STOPPED_AFTER_FULL_LOAD" --- Full load completed, with cached changes not applied.
"Stop Reason STOPPED_AFTER_CACHED_EVENTS" --- Full load completed, with cached changes applied.
"Stop Reason EXPRESS_LICENSE_LIMITS_REACHED"
"Stop Reason STOPPED_AFTER_DDL_APPLY" --- User-defined stop task after DDL applied.
"Stop Reason STOPPED_DUE_TO_LOW_MEMORY"
"Stop Reason STOPPED_DUE_TO_LOW_DISK"
"Stop Reason STOPPED_AT_SERVER_TIME" --- User-defined server time for stopping task.
"Stop Reason STOPPED_AT_COMMIT_TIME" --- User-defined commit time for stopping task.
"Stop Reason RECONFIGURATION_RESTART"
"Stop Reason RECYCLE_TASK"

nested_items.name: FailureMessages
nested_items.description: Error and other information about why a serverless replication failed.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReplicationStats
nested_items.description: This object provides a collection of statistics about a serverless replication.

nested_items.name: FullLoadProgressPercent
nested_items.description: The percent complete for the full load serverless replication.

nested_items.name: ElapsedTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The elapsed time of the replication, in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: TablesLoaded
nested_items.description: The number of tables loaded for this replication.

nested_items.name: TablesLoading
nested_items.description: The number of tables currently loading for this replication.

nested_items.name: TablesQueued
nested_items.description: The number of tables queued for this replication.

nested_items.name: TablesErrored
nested_items.description: The number of errors that have occured for this replication.

nested_items.name: FreshStartDate
nested_items.description: The date the replication was started either with a fresh start or a target reload.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The date the replication is scheduled to start.

nested_items.name: StopDate
nested_items.description: The date the replication was stopped.

nested_items.name: FullLoadStartDate
nested_items.description: The date the replication full load was started.

nested_items.name: FullLoadFinishDate
nested_items.description: The date the replication full load was finished.

nested_items.name: StartReplicationType
nested_items.description: The type of replication to start.

nested_items.name: CdcStartTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the start time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. Use either CdcStartTime or CdcStartPosition to specify when you want a CDC operation to start. Specifying both values results in an error.

nested_items.name: CdcStartPosition
nested_items.description: Indicates the start time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. Use either CdcStartTime or CdcStartPosition to specify when you want a CDC operation to start. Specifying both values results in an error.

nested_items.name: CdcStopPosition
nested_items.description: Indicates when you want a change data capture (CDC) operation to stop. The value can be either server time or commit time.

nested_items.name: RecoveryCheckpoint
nested_items.description: Indicates the last checkpoint that occurred during a change data capture (CDC) operation. You can provide this value to the CdcStartPosition parameter to start a CDC operation that begins at that checkpoint.

nested_items.name: ReplicationCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time the serverless replication was created.

nested_items.name: ReplicationUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time the serverless replication was updated.

nested_items.name: ReplicationLastStopTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when replication was last stopped.

nested_items.name: ReplicationDeprovisionTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when DMS will deprovision the replication.
